original_title: Axel Braun's Short Hair Don't Care 3
overview: It's easy to look beautiful with a full head of long, perfectly coiffed hair but only a few girls can look stunning with short hair. For the third volume of Axel Braun's acclaimed series, the legendary director picked four of the most attractive actresses in the business and used his masterful camerawork to showcase them in all their lustful beauty!
title: Axel Braun's Short Hair Don't Care 3
